column1: Note: see Dietary Guidelines for Americans 2010 (p. 80) for definition of food group.
1Individuals who completed two-day intake recalls, were 2 years and older, and were not pregnant or lactating.
2Children are those age 2-19 and adults are age 20 and older.
3The 185 percent income poverty line is the income threshold separating lower and higher income households.
Source: 2007-10 National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey (NHANES), two-day averages.
